title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/edit-tags-on-view-mode
author: LinOnetwo
name: Edit Tags On View Mode
description: Allow edit tags without enter edit mode.
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/title-caption/tree/master/src/edit-tags-on-view-mode">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/title-caption/tree/master/src/edit-tags-on-view-mode"/></$button>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/title-caption/">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/title-caption/"/></$button>

!! Feature

Allow edit tags without enter edit mode.

Forum: https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/any-plugin-to-edit-tag-on-view-mode/10313/7

!! 功能

允许在不进入编辑模式的情况下编辑标签。

论坛：https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/any-plugin-to-edit-tag-on-view-mode/10313/7
